title: Bug Report: Scrolling through partial image gives crazy amounts of log line items

labels.name: priority 3: low
labels.description: an issue that is barely adversely impacting the product key features, might be apparent but itâ€™s har

body:
# Bug Report

## Description
When scrolling through an image partially in view, the CLI shits out a ton of the same message (see partial logs below). 

## Steps to reproduce

1. someone posts an image in the chat
2. someone scrolls through it and the image becomes partially visible in the chat

#### Expected behavior

#### Actual behavior
Tons of log items

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: `dogfood/gamma.2`
- Operating System: Pop OS 21.04

## Logs
```
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Chat/views/ChatMessagesView.qml:69:5: QML QQuickItem: Binding loop detected for property "visible"
```
